name: Frankfurt International School
description: While living abroad in Germany. Also lived in Frankfurt for middle school.

name: The Taft School
description: Finished off high school. Played on varsity soccer, active community service member.

name: Northeastern University
description: Studying computer science and math, completing three co-ops gaining real world experience.

name: Pomperaug River Watershed Coalition
description: Promoted environmental sustainability and participated in community cleanup efforts. Featured in local newspaper for efforts.

name: YMCA Camp Tepee
description: Genuinely the most fun I have had working. Awarded singular 'Counselor the Year' and 'Dynamic Duo' with co-counselor.

name: Northeastern University London
description: Elected by peers to represent CS students while studying abroad. Advocated for various issues, ultimately leading to more office hours and minor assignment extensions.

name: Huntington Ave YMCA
description: Part time role during school semesters. Engaged with community members, bringing a positive attitude to the front desk everyday.

name: Conair
description: First technical internship gaining hands on experience with a multinational and recognizable brand. Developed in a traditional stack as well as in Saleforce Commerce Cloud.

name: MIT Lincoln Laboratory
description: First technical co-op helping grow and document DevSecOps practices for laboratory use. Maintained codebases for demonstration purposes and to exhibit group's capabilities.

name: Riverside Research
description: Second and third co-ops building on skills to help develop cutting edge AI tools for intelligence and defense use.
